section.p: To translate a document, you must open it so that the for this document is displayed.
Closing a document means to stop translating a document and to leave the .

section.title: Calling sequence
section.p: Select Close from the system menu.
This takes you back to the main window.

section.title: Results
section.p: The translation document, the , and the dictionaries used are saved in their current status. You can start any other task. The translation of this document can be continued at any time.
